      • getMaterialChoices

        public com.google.common.collect.Multimap<java.lang.Integer,SimpleMaterial> getMaterialChoices(int model)
        Returns the material choices for the provided garage model.
        Parameters:
        model - The garage model to return the material choices for.
        Returns:
        Returns the material choices for the components of the garage skeleton.The material is then mapped to the id of the component.
